contactFaqs.question: How quickly can you start my project?
contactFaqs.answer: Most projects can begin within 1-2 weeks of signing the contract. Rush projects may be accommodated based on our current workload and project complexity.

contactFaqs.question: Do you offer payment plans?
contactFaqs.answer: Yes! We offer flexible payment plans typically split into 50% upfront and 50% upon completion. For larger projects, we can arrange milestone-based payments.

contactFaqs.question: Will I own the code and design?
contactFaqs.answer: Absolutely! Upon final payment, you receive full ownership of all code, designs, and assets created for your project. We also provide complete documentation.

contactFaqs.question: What if I need changes after launch?
contactFaqs.answer: We provide 30 days of free minor adjustments after launch. For larger changes or ongoing support, we offer maintenance packages starting at $200/month.

services.question: How long does a typical web development project take?
services.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity. A simple website typically takes 2-4 weeks, while complex web applications can take 8-16 weeks.

services.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
services.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive maintenance packages that include security updates, performance monitoring, content updates, and technical support.

services.question: Can you work with our existing hosting provider?
services.answer: Absolutely! We can work with any hosting provider and can also recommend optimal solutions.

services.question: What technologies do you use for development?
services.answer: We use modern technologies including React, Vue.js, Next.js, and Node.js. We select the best technology stack for your specific project requirements.
